subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|f=門|t=门}} based on radical simplification.

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: In the 1956 first round revision table of variant Chinese characters ({{w2|zh|第一批异体字整理表}}) by the People's Republic of China, {{zh-l|閤}} was listed as a {{w|Variant Chinese characters|variant form}} of {{l|zh|閣}}.<!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/第一批异体字整理表/1955年 --> As a variant form, {{l|zh|閤}} is to be replaced by {{l|zh|閣}} as its orthodox form, which is succeeded by <big>阁</big> as the simplified form of {{l|zh|閣}}.
